name: Skip 10 Solitaire
description:
For all card game lovers: Here is the new, exciting game remix from well-known card games that you love so much. The rules of the game have elements from popular card games such as "Cat and Mouse" and "Solitaire" and are easy to learn.

Put all your cards on the building pile in ascending order faster than your opponents. Sounds easy, but watch out, the computer opponents are smart and won't make it easy for you.
